import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { RouterModule } from '@angular/router'; import { TokenServicesService } from 'src/app/_services/token-services.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-mostrar-servicios', templateUrl: './mostrar-servicios.component.html', styleUrls: ['./mostrar-servicios.component.css'], }) export class MostrarServiciosComponent implements OnInit{ public userServices:any; public loading = false; constructor(private _dataServices: TokenServicesService) { } getUserServices(){ this.loading = true; this._dataServices.getUserRoledServices() .subscribe( results => { this.userServices = results; this.loading = false; }, notFound =>{ this.userServices = JSON.parse(notFound.error).message; this.loading = false; } ) } ngOnInit(): void { this.getUserServices(); } hireService(){ } }
